resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/156513</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>156513</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2274</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Torricelli's Law</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesetz Torricellis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Loi de Torricelli</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lei De Torricelli</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Legge Del Torricelli</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Νόμος Torricelli</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ley De Torricelli</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which demonstrates an experiment to prove Torricelli's law involving the intensity of fluid flow through a small hole in the container.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">laws of Physics</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation, die ein Experiment zeigt, um das 
Gesetz Torricellis zu prüfen, welches die Intensität der 
Flüssigkeit mit einbezieht, fließen eine kleine Bohrung im Behälter
durch.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation qui démontre une expérience pour 
prouver la loi de Torricelli impliquant l'intensité du fluide 
traversent un petit trou dans le récipient.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que demonstre uma experiência para 
provar a lei de Torricelli que envolve a intensidade do líquido corre
através de um furo pequeno no recipiente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che dimostra un esperimento per 
dimostrare la legge del Torricelli che coinvolge l'intensità di 
liquido attraversa un piccolo foro nel contenitore.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που καταδεικνύει ένα πείραμα για να 
αποδείξει το νόμο Torricelli που περιλαμβάνει την ένταση της 
ρευστής ροής μέσω μιας μικρής τρύπας στο εμπορευματοκιβώτιο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que demuestra un experimento para 
probar la ley de Torricelli que implica la intensidad del líquido 
atraviesa un agujero pequeño en el envase.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesetze von Physik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lois de la physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">leis da física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">leggi di fisica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">νόμοι της φυσικής</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">leyes de la física</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <status>
            <source>statusValues</source>
            <value>final</value>
          </status>
          <contribute>
            <role>

version:3.0

        </lifeCycle>

        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>

            <value>web page</value>
          </learningResourceType>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="en">14-18</string>

          </typicalAgeRange>
          <context>

        </educational>
        <rights>

        </rights>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>

          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>

              <id>978</id>

    </metadata>
  </description>
